name: Arthur Chance and The Summoner's Moon (Demo)
name_original: Arthur Chance and The Summoner's Moon (Demo)
description: Arthur Chance and The Summoner's Moon is a fun cartoon fantasy point and click adventure in the style of games like The Curse of Monkey Island, Deponia, and Broken Sword.  This demo will let you guide Arthur as he starts his adventure to save his magical mentor Odhi from the mysterious evil wizard, Tarrok.
